spiritsExplanation:
The workout, titled 'Pauses Cool-Down,' is explicitly described as a cool-down with a focus on technique. This aligns closely with the 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit due to its emphasis on recovery and relaxation after more intense exercise sessions. Additionally, since the session involves technique focus and a steady format, it shares elements with the 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit, as it likely involves methodical practice and attention to rowing form. This justifies a score of 0.7.

Thus, these aspects corroborate the classification, with each spirit focusing on different facets of the workout experience.
